title: Films To Be Buried With Christmas Special with Lou Sanders & Brett Goldstein
itunes:title: Films To Be Buried With Christmas Special with Lou Sanders & Brett Goldstein
itunes:subtitle: LOOK OUT! It’s only the great annual Films To Be Buried With Christmas Special! Surprises, treats, presents, and LOU SANDERS! More? JUST LISTEN!
description:
LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! NOT ONLY THAT - it’s the once a year only CHRISTMAS SPECIAL! What a way to celebrate! Join your host LOU SANDERS as she… Wait hold on… Let me try that again… Join your host LOU SANDERS as… Okay hold up… Something’s going on here… Let me check something…


…well look at that… It seems that this truly IS a Christmas gift to you, the listeners - ladies and gentlemen, the tables have truly turned in here! It’s the long awaited episode where Brett has bought his one way ticket to the great cinema in the sky and must pick his own films to be buried with! And as you may have gathered - yes, the host is LOU SANDERS herself! The episode gatecrasher and incredibly funny lady herself has stormed the studio and grabbed the mic and assumed hosting duties! So all there is for you to do now is to sit back, relax, maybe find someone nearby to cuddle (couldn’t hurt) and enjoy this phenomenal, sensational and absolutely action packed Christmas Special edition of FILMS TO BE BURIED WITH!

OH - and also - enjoy a half hour megamix of music from me, Buddy Peace (producer of this podcast) at the end! MY GIFT TO YOU!


––––– ––––– –––––


LINKS FOR THIS EPISODE:

• LOU SANDERS on TWITTER!

• LOU on THE INTERNET!

• 'WHY IS YOUR BOTTOM SO DIRTY' podcast!


• BUDDY PEACE on BANDCAMP!

• BUDDY PEACE on THE INTERNET!


• BRETT GOLDSTEIN on TWITTER!

• BRETT GOLDSTEIN on INSTAGRAM!

• BRETT GOLDSTEIN on PATREON!

• 'SUPERBOB' - Brett's 2015 feature film!

• 'CORNERBOYS' with BRETT & SCROOBIUS PIP!


• DISTRACTION PIECES NETWORK on FACEBOOK

• DISTRACTION PIECES NETWORK on INSTAGRAM

Support this show http://supporter.acast.com/filmstobeburiedwith.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
